purpose: Enhance productivity by connecting and retrieving information from various external sources like search engines, Slack, Notion, and more.
principle: Integrates with multiple APIs and services to provide a unified interface for information retrieval and knowledge management.
reusability: Highly composable with support for various APIs and services, allowing integration into existing workflows and systems.
limitations: Alpha status indicates potential instability and incomplete feature set; may require configuration for specific integrations.
name: SurfSense
description: Open Source Alternative to NotebookLM / Perplexity / Glean, connected to external sources such as search engines (Tavily, Linkup), Slack, Linear, Notion, YouTube, GitHub and more.
highlight: Open source alternative to popular knowledge management and search tools, with extensive integration capabilities.
